caption: CIS Benchmark
description: The CIS Benchmark object describes best practices for securely configuring IT systems, software, networks, and cloud infrastructure as defined by the Center for Internet Security. See also Getting to Know the CIS Benchmarks.
name: cis_benchmark

desc.description: The CIS Benchmark detailed description. For example: This policy setting determines which users can create symbolic links.

name.description: The CIS Benchmark Standard name. For example: CIS Microsoft Windows 10 Enterprise Benchmark.

rule.description: The CIS benchmark Rule name. For example: L1 Configure Create symbolic links.

version.description: The CIS benchmark Version number. For example: 3.0.0
